scripts.auth: npm run auth:npm && npm run auth:docker
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:sandbox && npm run build:vscode
scripts.build:win:exe: npm run bundle && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/win',{recursive:true})" && pkg bundle/gemini.js --target node20-win-x64 --compress Brotli --public --output dist/win/kolosal.exe
scripts.build:mac:exe:arm64: npm run bundle && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/mac',{recursive:true})" && pkg bundle/gemini.js --target node20-macos-arm64 --compress Brotli --public --output dist/mac/kolosal-arm64 && chmod +x dist/mac/kolosal-arm64
scripts.build:mac:exe:x64: npm run bundle && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/mac',{recursive:true})" && pkg bundle/gemini.js --target node20-macos-x64 --compress Brotli --public --output dist/mac/kolosal-x64 && chmod +x dist/mac/kolosal-x64
scripts.build:mac:exe: npm run build:mac:exe:arm64 && npm run build:mac:exe:x64
scripts.build:mac:exe:universal: lipo -create -output dist/mac/kolosal dist/mac/kolosal-arm64 dist/mac/kolosal-x64 && chmod +x dist/mac/kolosal
scripts.build:mac:pkg:old: npm run build:mac:exe:universal && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const r='.pkgroot';fs.rmSync(r,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(p.join(r,'usr','local','bin'),{recursive:true});fs.cpSync('dist/mac/kolosal',p.join(r,'usr','local','bin','kolosal'));" && pkgbuild --identifier ai.kolosal.kolosal-code --install-location / --version $npm_package_version --root .pkgroot dist/mac/KolosalCode-macos.pkg
scripts.bundle: npm run generate && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" node esbuild.config.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" node scripts/copy_bundle_assets.js
scripts.bundle:pkg: npm run generate && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" node esbuild.pkg.config.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" node scripts/copy_bundle_assets.js
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspaces --if-present && npm run test:scripts
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env VERBOSE=true KEEP_OUTPUT=true npm run test:integration:sandbox:none
scripts.test:integration:all: npm run test:integration:sandbox:none && npm run test:integration:sandbox:docker && npm run test:integration:sandbox:podman
scripts.test:integration:sandbox:docker: GEMINI_SANDBOX=docker npm run build:sandbox && GEMINI_SANDBOX=docker vitest run --root ./integration-tests
scripts.preflight: npm run clean && npm ci && npm run format && npm run lint:ci && npm run build && npm run typecheck && npm run test:ci
